capsules_submitted.utterance: Ron's belongings are a bit of a mystery to me. I mean, I've seen him around with this gray mouse thing, but I'm not entirely sure what it is or where he got it from. It could be something really cool, or maybe it's just an old trinket he found lying around.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Ron has some gray mouse stuff belonging to him. I'm pretty sure about that, but it's also possible that he might have some other things like that too. It seems a bit neutral to me, but at the same time, there's a hint of something being off or unusual about it.

Ron's belongings are a bit of an oddity, I think. He's got this weird little mouse that he carries around with him everywhere. It's gray and looks like it belongs in a museum or something. I've seen him pick it up and cuddle it when no one's looking, which is pretty funny.
